name: Knock Knock Terror
description:
[my first short horror game]

WARNING: This game contains loud sounds, flashing lights & jumpscares.

One late-night, you woke up thirsty and made the decision to go fetch a bottle of water. After drinking the water, you were heading back to your bedroom when all of a sudden, someone knocked on your door.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaOFpbkda1mAjGgJ_iqQ_CEaOaWbrQEh2

Controls:

WASD - Movement

F - Flashlight

E - To Use/Interact

Space - Drink

LShift - Sprint/Run
